page1.title: Welcome to spontify.me
page1.text:
Would you like more spontaneity in your life? For example if:
  • Unfortunately your friends don't have time, but you still want to do something
  • Your professional or private life in a strange place city
  • You enjoy organizing events where new people can join you and your friends

page2.title: You're in the right place...
page2.text:
if you are not looking for partnerships. We try our best to create friendships and spontaneity here and to suppress sex requests or the like.

We match buddies and locations...

page3.title: The Matching
page3.text:
is based on the following criteria:
  • Attributes that you value in others
  • Age
  • Gender
  • Budget
  • Locations that you like together
And we have another treat, we also match via Bluetooth!This means in an environment with many people, e.g. quickly find matching via Bluetooth.

page4.title: We are Open...
page4.text:
• Open Source
  • Open Minded
  • Open Philosophy
We don't collect data for advertising, we don't sell data. We just want to become the best social platform for people to bring more authenticity and spontaneity to life.

info: The app is available in the Apple and Play Store, but also on the web at
